game.name: Portal of Evil: Stolen Runes Collector's Edition
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, Steam 트레이딩 카드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: The gates to another world will open soon! You can stop the impending disaster, but to do so at all costs to return the stolen stamps! Vanessa is the only heiress of Abraham Van Helsinga, a member of the secret order of light guarding the peace of our world.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The gates to another world will open soon! You can stop the impending disaster, but to do so at all costs to return the stolen stamps! Vanessa is the only heiress of Abraham Van Helsinga, a member of the secret order of light guarding the peace of our world.

reviewHighlights.text: 무난한 HOG. 다만 한글이 아니라서 찾기가 어렵습니다. 그리고 게임 자체에 공략이 내장되어 있네요(힌트 버튼 아래 전략 가이드). [code] 스팀 큐레이터 : [url=store.steampowered.com/curator/44849820/]INSTALLING NO...
